RelatedSentence: - In memory of the genocide of the Pontic Greeks , Armenian National Assembly Deputy Speaker Eduard Sharmazanov and Greek Ambassador Ioannis Taghis on Monday visited the Armenian Genocide Memorial in capital city Yerevan ( photo ) .
